entry.title: Version 1.1
entry.markdown:
[New Content]
> Added some new basic Infantry models
[Balance Adjustments] > Nothing
[Bugfixes]
> Minor issues fixed > Useless files removed
[Known Issues] > Some models may not appear. > Firefight may not work properly in mp.

entry.title: Version 1.0
entry.summary: Added new VanillaPlus content and reworked a lot of code.
entry.markdown:
[Going Forward...] > Developer Comment: Following this update, the progress to remove legacy content has begun.
[New Content]
> Added new content from VanillaPlus, such as gamemodes and leader content.
[Balance Adjustments] > Nothing
[Bugfixes]
> Fixed several old issues
[Known Issues] > Some models may not appear. > Firefight may not work properly in mp.
